resources.string: This is the Android version of Plancake: the free online personal organizer. \n You need a Plancake account in order to use this application. If you haven\'t got one, please go to http://www.plancake.com
Plancake needs to download all your tasks and lists to your mobile, this will only happen once. \n It may take several minutes.
Syncing tasks between your device and Plancake online...
An Internet connection is needed in order to perform this operation.
Wrong authentication. Please double check your email address and password are correct (maybe you changed your password recently?)
Your Todo list does NOT show tasks with due date. These are shown in your Calendar as usual

Plancake for Android 

 All right reserved. 


 This is a beta version, thus it may contain bugs. 


 Some features may be available only to Supporter Accounts. 


 Copyright © 2010-2011 Danyuki Software Limited (Company No. 07554549) 


 For further info, please visit: 
 http://www.plancake.com
The last synchronization was too long ago to be able to perform a partial sync. You need to delete all the application data and relaunch the application to re-sync in full.
You have reached your daily synchronization limit.
Successful synchronization. \n Number of syncs left for today:
Please consider becoming a Supporter to have more synchronizations available.
Connect this app back to your Plancake account
By going ahead, you will lose all the application data on your mobile phone. Are you sure you want to do this?
